actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-903.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 294 - 59 (Record Vote No: 391).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on the bill (H.R. 6267) to revitalize the housing industry by strengthening the financial stability of home mortgage lending institutions and ensuring the availability of home mortgage loans.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6267 (Home Mortgages).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on the bill (H.R. 6267) to revitalize the housing industry by strengthening the financial stability of home mortgage lending institutions and ensuring the availability of home mortgage loans.
